Title: The Convent
Writer: Manoel de Oliveira (scenario and dialogue), Agustina Bessa-Luís (inspired by an idea from)
Actors: Catherine Deneuve, John Malkovich, Luís Miguel Cintra, Leonor Silveira
Plot: The journey of Michael Padovic, an American professor who arrives with his wife, Helene, at a Portuguese convent where he expects to find the documents needed to prove his theory: Shakespeare was born in Spain; not in England.
